summary: DASH CRACKING.  THIS IS A KNOWN ISSUE WITH THESE VEHICLES AND GM NEEDS TO FIX IT.  EVERY ONE I HAVE SEEN DOES THIS.  THEY CRACK NEAR THE AIRBAG ORIGINALLY, WHICH MINE IS.  IT IS BEGINNING TO CRACK IN OTHER PLACES.  THE SHARP EDGES HAVE CUT MY FINGER BEFORE WHILE JUST WIPING THE DASH.  THE SHARP EDGES COULD ALSO CUT INTO ELECTRICAL WIRES DOWN THE ROAD.  THIS VEHICLE HAS ALWAYS BEEN TAKEN CARE OF AND STORED INDOORS AND THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE TO HAVE SHARP CRACKED EDGES LIKE THIS FROM NORMAL USE.
